GSD.description:
ARM: OMAP2+: pdata-quirks: Fix refcount leak bug

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.2 by commit 37f0c89778576ce3d52f40c1e9e727fbddedb28e. For more details please see the references link.
